name: RemoveCustomFieldFromProject
description:
Remove a custom field setting from an Asana project.

Use this tool to remove a custom field setting from a specified project in Asana. This requires the 'projects:write' scope.

parameters.name: project_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the Asana project.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: custom_field_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the custom field to remove from the specified project in Asana.

value_schema.description: The custom field to remove from this portfolio.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Formats the response in a readable way with line breaks and indentation. Use for debugging as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: project_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: data.custom_field
parameters.description: The custom field to remove from this portfolio.

value_schema.description: The custom field to remove from this portfolio.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
